remarks: Lemma for ~ regexmid .  If ` A ` has a minimal element, excluded middle follows.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Sep-2019.)
statement:
regexmidlemm.a $e |- A = { x e. { (/) , { (/) } } | ( x = { (/) } \/ ( x = (/) /\ ph ) ) } $.
regexmidlem1 $p |- ( E. y ( y e. A /\ A. z ( z e. y -> -. z e. A ) ) -> ( ph \/ -. ph ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d ph x y $.
